Reviews.Title: Foscam 8919 DSP bug
Reviews.Author: J Den
Reviews.Content: This review is to inform current owners and potential buyers of a DSP bug that affects the Foscam 8919 line of cameras. This bug exhibits itself by either rebooting, black video or neon colors. Foscam has confirmed the bug and does have a repair procedure in place. Although, users have had varying degrees of friction in processing these repairs. Foscam has responded and claims that all cameras purchased from specific retailers as of November 2013 have the issue 100% resolved. However, new users continue to report faulty cameras from these sources.This bug affects multiple models of Foscam cameras. In an effort to better comply with Amazon review guidelines regarding duplicate information, the details of this bug can be found in the review linked below.http://www.amazon.com/review/R30GQV3F3C8KGX/ref=cm_cr_rdp_perm?ie=UTF8&ASIN;=B006ZP8UOW&linkCode;=&nodeID;=&tag;=

Reviews.Title: Great outdoor PT IP camera
Reviews.Author: Allan Ramiro
Reviews.Content: I have had my share of experience setting up my zmodo ip camera and when i bought foscams, it was basically the same tango.  I also have a few more foscam  FI8918W whose setup is basically the same for this one. I have set up the camera in my front door so I have a good view of my front lawn and drivewayThe good: - set up was fairly easy once you have experience. but if you don't have any experience yet, be prepared to be challenged.  - I would recommend to watch the installation video twice before attempting to unwrap the package. - the picture is good.  IR is good as well at night. - Pan and tilt works fine and no problem. - Customer support at certain times is here in the US.  I am just amazed when the support is still here in the US! - it does take an IT background before you can set up the wireless settings.  However, by carefully following the installation instructions, you should be able to do it.  Do note that you have an option for foscam support to take over your pc and set it up for you.  will take time though, but they get it done. - As it is an outdoor camera, it should be prepared to get wet.  I have no issues with it when it rains.the bad: - the first i bought had hardware problems wherein the pan and tilt is limited (it would not go past 90 degrees in all direction)  Good thing is that I live in Houston and thus was able to visit their office and had the item replaced with no questions ask.  You do have to report the issue ahead of time. - the first few months was bad as the camera had to be restarted at least 2 times a week.  Imagine being disappointed when you view  your cameras while waiting for an important package.  However, after the latest firmware update, the camera is performing well.- The IR works, but since the IR LED are inside the housing and thus reflects back to the lens, but not that much.  its just like being foggy, but the perimeter is still visible.some tips:- before setting it up in places where you would need to use ladders (or basically before investing any efforts in installing it), or before you configure the camera, I would recommend to flash it first with the latest firmware.  There have been known issues with the earlier shipments of cameras that had issues with the firmware.- the tilt would not go beyond 90 degrees vertically (it can not look up)  so you may need to install it high enough to see around your area. - occasional cleaning of the lens casing may be required to maintain a clear view.  I do it every other month with eyeglasses wipes.  just be careful and do not put excessive pressure on the casing.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8919W review & IMPORTANT SECURITY INFO
Reviews.Author: Sandy S "Sandy S"
Reviews.Content: My Review & IMPORTANT SECURITY INFOI have 11 Foscam cameras (9 are indoor: Foscam FI8910W; and 2 are this model: FI8919W) I have them in 3 different locations/properties. Installation and setup were relatively easy and I HIGHLY recommend watching the how-to videos on the foscam.us site and search for: MJPEG Setup VideosOne of the locations that I installed this FI8919W camera is connected to the internet via a Telus modem. Between my son and myself, (both very computer literate), we must have spent a good 10 hours trying to get this camera to work ... in that we could have it recognized while connected to the network ... we had to use our iphones on 3G and then the software would connect to the camera. As soon as we switched off 3G and connected via wifi, the camera would disappear. Yes, we tried everything conceivable with respect to port forwarding; DDNS; etc., etc. ... in the end we had to create 2 installations - one for wifi and one for 3G. Anyway, that seems to be more of an issue with the Telus modem/router than with the Foscam camera, as all of the other locations (using different service providers) do not have this issue.So why am I only giving this camera 3 stars you ask? Well, for one thing, the more I learn about Foscam, the less I respect the company. First of all, while searching around for a fix to the above problem, I came across a site ( informationweek . com) (search for: Wireless Camera Flaws Allow Remote Exploitation) ... article written April 16, 2013 ... the article warns, in part that:  "...Foscam have a firmware vulnerability that would allow an attacker to bypass security defenses and remotely steal credentials stored on the device..."  "...prior to firmware version 11.37.2.49..."  So I checked my cameras and found that: 8 were running .49 / 2 were running .52 / 1 was running .54.  Okay, no big deal ... I went into the camera's software > Device Management > Upgrade Device Firmware ... and from there you find 2 options to browse your hard drive for the files to update firmware and web UI. Really? There was not link to the site to download latest firmware. There was no option i.e.: check for latest upgrade ... whatever. So the user has go to the Foscam site and *sign up* for the right to download the upgrades. In the authentication email that is then sent to your email address, it reads in part:****We received your request for the latest Foscam firmware.  Before we send you the download links we want to be certain we have your permission. Please note that by confirming you agree that, in addition to receiving firmware updates, you may receive emails regarding product updates and discount coupon codes.Please click the link below to confirm and then we will send you the firmware and discounts by email. Thanks!*****Really, Foscam? I have to agree to accept promotional emails from you before you will allow me to secure my camera from unauthorized access?  Okay ... whatever ... I hit the link and was taken to the site to download the updates ... BUT first I wanted to see what's new with the latest updates ... so I read the ReadMe.txt that was included in the download. One of the things that it fixes is: Fix the bug that no need to do authentication when using some CGI commandshmmmm.... interesting ... so I did a google search for [ Foscam Fix the bug that no need to do authentication when using some CGI commands ] and found a very interesting article written just one month ago - Jan 24/14 on pcworld.com. In that article the author writes about a search engine called Shodan (The Dark Google) ... and how this search engine can allow users to find and infiltrate various devices connected to the internet. Not only will the hackers be able to control your cameras (watch you) ... they can get access to your entire system. You need to take precautions ... i.e., download the latest camera firmware updates and be creative with your username and passwords. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND that you google the following keywords: [ CNN money Shodan: The scariest search engine on the Internet ] and watch the video by David Goldman.  Then if you have the cameras or are thinking of buying one ... be sure to immediately change the default username and passwords and fill in all 8 user/password options under Device Management > User Settings- also change the default port for remote access and regularly check the camera’s logs, which can reveal unauthorized access attempts.So in conclusion, I will say that these are fairly good cameras for the money. I would probably buy more if needed, however, I wish the company made the upgrades more user friendly and not require the customers to jump through hoops to get the upgrades.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, but mine is wired.
Reviews.Author: George Pinson
Reviews.Content: 1st, I have not tried this camera in wireless mode.  I had a 50 foot Cat 6 cable and so I just hooked it up wired. Initially I had problems with certain features not working but then discovered I had a network problem.  After I changed ports on the network, everything works flawlessly.I have 5 presets so I don't have to scroll and the picture is great.  The IR at night allows you to see what is going on out to 30-40 feet and in daylight the picture IMHO is very good.Documentation is a little sketchy, but a little digging on the Foscam website FAQs and watching a couple of videos on their website gave me all the information I needed.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18191W remote setup
Reviews.Author: spinjamr "spinjamr"
Reviews.Content: The Foscam F18919W was a breeze to setup using the provided Quick Installation Guide.  I was able to have my camera working in a few minute on my local network.  When it came to making the required configuration changes to my router for web viewing, I called Foscam Technical Support and talked to Harry Foster.  He was able to remotely control my computer and very quickly made the necessary charges to allow my great new IP camera to be viewable over the World Wide Web.  It was magic!  Mr. Foster was very helpful and courteous. One small improvement to the product would be the ability to tilt the cam up 90~100 degrees so I can look up.  I can only raise my camera to 80 ~ 85 degrees.  Thank you FOSCAM! John G

Reviews.Title: Nothing but problems
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera direct from Foscam.  The first one worked for two days, I called Foscam support and they could not get it to restart so I had to call and get an RMA number and return it. I received shipping return confirmation and waited to receive email new camera was on the way. After multiple calls and emails proving they had received the return they sent a new one slow boat, so I was without product for 2 weeks.  I spent a afternoon reconfiguring the new camera and testing it in the house before I mounted it high on garage. Camera would move to a point and then would stop rotation, lock up and drop off line.  I rebooted many times all with same results, it would rotate to a point stop and disconnect.  I called support they confirmed and said camera would have to come down and be plugged into router to test. I had to climb up on garage to remove, so I told support to call me back in 10 minutes while I climbed ladder and removed camera.  Never got all call back, so I called them again got another person who went through test said camera was working fine, so I climbed ladder and reinstalled only to have camera freeze up again. Called support and they said it was a hardware problem and to return it.  Here we go again.....camera is not worth a crap.

Reviews.Title: Good technology horrible support camera cannot tilt high enough to see horizon
Reviews.Author: Chris "CS"
Reviews.Content: This was my 8th or 9th Foscam and my first experience with their Customer Service. Beautiful clear picture like all of their cameras but the problem is in the pan-tilt mechanism. The lens will tilt to 90 degrees but cannot see the horizon due to the magnification of the lens. After multiple e-mails with detailed pictures and multiple calls I was sent a replacement that did the same thing, it is a design flaw. I have spent endless hours on the phone and sending e-mails to their customer support to return the 2nd camera but there is a severe language barrier that results in wasted time and frustration. I finally reached a supervisor after multiple days of waiting for call backs that never came and was told the issue would be resolved. When the support person e-mailed me it was the same problem. Avoid Foscam if you think you will need support, it is not worth the time and aggravation.

Reviews.Title: Works ok during the day, at night...not so much!
Reviews.Author: Erin Pomykala
Reviews.Content: We bought one of these direct from Foscam, and while their support was fantastic and quick to respond, this camera just does not do what it's supposed to. During the day, image quality is good, but the IR sensor kept flashing on and off on its own. At night, the IR washed out any image, whether 5 feet away or 50, it didn't matter.

Reviews.Title: Look at all the FAKE 5 star and 4 star reviews before buying!
Reviews.Author: redhill
Reviews.Content: If you look at all the reviewers who gave it top marks from January 2014 onward, they all praise FOSCAM support and they have only other 5 star reviews for FO-SCAM products...must be a contest.These kind of shenanigans are big red flags for purchasers. The flaws in software and hardware are too numerous to list, and the impeccable support that the fake FO-SCAM reviewers gush about is just smoke, fog and mirrors.As a former Ford executive once said," The APPEARANCE of quality is everything.".

Reviews.Title: Good value, but has some issues.
Reviews.Author: Larryg
Reviews.Content: I have owned the F18919W for about 3-weeks now.  I bought it directly from Foscam.  This camera was my first foray into security cameras for my home.  My concept was to install 1 camera on opposite corners of the house, thereby having a full 360 degree sight around the house.  I also purchased this model because it was wireless (WIFI capable) and as such all I would need to do is have electricity nearby to power the camera.  Additionally, I wanted to be able to view the feed, and control the camera remotely, either via remote PC, or smart phone.  Overall, the functionality is workable, but frustrating.Well… here is the stuff they don’t tell you.  It’s wireless, and so far seems to work fine with my WIFI, however, I needed Foscam to set up the remote access because the manual doesn’t address that.  It locks onto to your WIFI signal fairly easily, but its the remote viewing/operation that is the problem (router, firewall, etc.).  Also, because its wireless, you can mount it just about anywhere.  I mounted the first one on the corner of the house, at the roof line, in order to get a good view of all surrounding areas.  It was a pain retrofitting a mounting solution because its not really made for mounting on a corner, and I had to buy a separate corner mount bracket from a 3rd party suppler because Foscam doesn’t offer such a bracket.  OK, so I finally get it mounted (after major retrofitting) and all is well… until I discovered there is a hardware update available for the camera.  No problem right… wrong !  The update cannot be applied via WIFI.  Are you kidding me !  So, how am I supposed to update the camera???  I bought a WIFI camera so I didn’t have to run LAN cable to the camera because its in such an out of the way location it would be nearly impossible to run cable to it.  That issue is still unresolved as of this date, and of course, its not been updated yet.Video quality.  Under ideal conditions, the picture quality is great.  The directional capabilities for viewing the surrounding area is great (in part due to the corner mount).  However… nighttime viewing is not so great.  It has infrared capability, and can see at night, but there are some challenging situations that make the feature less than optimal, or even meet some expectations.  First, there are halo type glow spots on the video feed in nighttime situations.  I was told by Foscam support that this is a result of the infrared lights reflecting on the inside of the glass globe protecting the lens.  I notice it more when the lens is pointed almost horizontal to level.  So, unless you are mounting this thing way WAY up high, you will likely run into this problem.  Its annoying, and could possibly obscure something you would want to see, such as a person’s face if it were to be present in one of the areas obscured by the halo.  The situation is worse in the rain.  This issue does not affect the entire viewing area, but none the less, its annoying.Rain and snow… REALLY obscures the picture quality, especially at night.  Additionally, depending on the sensitivity of the alerts, will more than likely set off an alert if at night mostly.  If you are like me, I have the alerts sent to my email, you will be annoyed by the frequency of the false alerts.  One day I awoke to over 75 alerts in my email.  Yes, I could reduce the sensitivity of the alert trigger, however I have found that where I have the camera mounted related to the area I want viewed, I need the alerts set at #7 (out of 10) in order to trigger the alert of a human walking in that area.  Now, I turn off the alerts at night if its raining or snowing.  (note to thieves… pay no attention to the this).Also, I have a bird feeder in the viewing area.  During the daytime birds flying to and from the feeder will set off the alert.  One night there was some kind of bug flying around the lens setting off an alert.  Also, alerts seem to be triggered more by horizontal activity rather than vertical activity.  When the camera is pointed at my driveway, no alert is triggered by a car leaving the driveway, however cars driving down the street will trigger an alert.  The viewing area of the street is less than 10% of the viewing area (at the top of the picture), while the area viewed with my driveway is 90%... yet a car moving horizontally across the 10% of the area triggers the alert.  If no car is traveling down the road in front of my house, then my car leaving the driveway will not trigger an alert.I am also experiencing problems with alert video recording.  More times than not I will get an email alert, but no video is captured (only still pictures).  For instance, one morning I awoke to over 75 alerts… not one minute of video was captured, only stills.  However I have had the video alert recording to work, I just can figure out how to make it work on every alert.  Why have an alert if you can’t record the event.  Stills are better than nothing, however the stills are sequenced at user defined intervals.  If I knew how long an intruder was staying, I could better determine how to set the interval frequency.  (note to thieves… please call ahead and let me know how long you will be staying).Overall I am satisfied, yet disappointed at the same time.  What I have now is 100% more than I had, however its frustrating that the problems cannot be resolved.  I can now view the video feed from any computer anywhere, and even on my smart phone, which again is a vast improvement over not being able to see anything previously, and for that I don’t regret the effort and expense to install the camera.  I have yet to purchase the second camera for the other corner of the house.  I have seen they have a new model (F18928W I believe is the number), and I am likely to wait for that model in hopes maybe they have resolved some of the issues described above.  Perhaps if you purchased say the F19805W model you might not encounter the nighttime visibility issues I have experienced, however I wanted the pan and tilt capabilities and for that I needed to get the F18919W model.  Supposedly the new model also has a zoom feature.  A zoom feature would be a added bonus that I would find desirable.  I write this on 2/6/14 and the -28 is supposed to be out this month, and hopefully it will.

Reviews.Title: foscam f18919 PT Camera
Reviews.Author: Minden Ron
Reviews.Content: this is a pretty good camera.  Had some difficulty getting it setup for wireless.  wish it had zoom and HD resolution,  other than that it's a fairly good camera.  don't expect to read a license plate number from it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money for outdoor security
Reviews.Author: John E Wiemann
Reviews.Content: it even works well in the 20 degree range. I don't use their software I use others but the night vision has about 40' range. Never knew I had so many little critters around at night

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8919W Wireless Outdoor Pan/Tilt IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Mr John Haugh
Reviews.Content: This camera is being offered with known problems, the manufacture claims they inform their agents and customers the IR mode does not work as advertised, in fact it does not work at night.  Steer well clear of this model.  The support is a jokeNo stars

Reviews.Title: Good Physical Quality, Poor Interior components to back it up
Reviews.Author: John Morrison
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera expecting a good quality camera. Granted the build quality is incomparable to other cameras at this price point, but the software/ sensors in the camera are horrible. It next to never works, you will just see a black screen and then it reboots. After rebooting you can see the picture for all of 5 minutes then it goes away. I found that whenever I tried to move it I.E: Pan or Tilt it would go black and stop working. I personally did not trust it so I returned it. I purchased the Agasio A621W which is a much better camera that is a little cheeper, only down side it doesn't have night vision.

Reviews.Title: WARNING:  NO SUPPORT FROM FOSCAM
Reviews.Author: San Diego Amazon
Reviews.Content: WARNING!  Foscam does not provide technical support for product purchased from Amazon.  This is horrible behavior that (a) Foscam does not support product sold by Amazon; and (b) that Amazon allows this to happen.  Their manuals are poor, the online support non existent, and this particular model - FI8919W - does not show up in any android software.  Many aspects of the software seem non-functional (presets, logging).  THERE ARE BETTER OPTIONS - SAVE YOURSELF FRUSTRATION.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Frederick  Shoemaker "The Old Shoe"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this outside cam, which out weighs the competition as an anchor as it is heavy as heck, and it is pure junk.The signal emited form it and all other outside Foscams I have is less then25% and I have a top of the line trend net router.This one I purchased directly from Foscam and it worked once and then went dead.  Their outside cameras are a joke because of poor signals emited by the cheap antennas on them.For the heck of it I took a cheap Foscam inside cam which had been damaged as to the pan and tilt as it will not tilt anymore and put it outside.  I have had it running for four straight days without a hitch and its signal is 59+%.Purchase this cam and you will be sorry.Shoe

Reviews.Title: PTZ is useless
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: I used the patrol setting to scan through 4 pre-sets.  With every loop the presets drift.  After an hour the presets are completely lost.  About 30 days later, the presets stopped working all together.  My guess is Foscam uses a cheap motor that is imprecise and does not last long.  Also good engineering practice would be to use feedback so that the software actually knows what direction the camera is pointing and then can close the loop to correct position.  But I think they don't use feedback, so the software does not actually know where the camera is pointing.  So errors just accumulate.  That is like blindly following turn-by-turn driving directions, but not being able see out the front window of your car. Before  you know it you are in a ditch, just like this camera.After about 20 days, the camera started losing its wireless connection.  Had to restart every 10 minutes.  Very strange, because that feature had worked until then.  My other Foscams (non-PTZ models) have reliable wireless connections though despite being farther away from my router.When reviewing the positive reviews, see when customers posted those (i.e. just after installing or after actually using for a while).  Some other reviewers suggest that the positive postings are fake.  From my experience with this product, I would not be surprised.Also, Foscam customer service was not useful.  The person I talked to knew nothing about the mechanism, so she could not tell me whether a replacement unit would actually be able to keep its presets.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk, save your money.
Reviews.Author: w.w
Reviews.Content: This thing is a complete piece of junk, and I should have known better at this price.  I was surprised to see an ourdoor network dome camera for $200 but you really get what you pay for.  For starters, the software is absolute crap.  It looks like it was developed by total amateurs.My camera had a black spot in the middle of the view, and I should have returned it right away, but it was for a remote property and time was limited to get the system setup.  That "small black spot" is now returning full blown screen artifacts that cover 30-50% of the screen randomly.Save your cash, do not buy this one.

Reviews.Title: My latest camera from Foscam
Reviews.Author: Waslost1
Reviews.Content: I have several already and this one is my newest edition to use on the outside of the house. I set this up and everything works as expected and per the description but I will note that the range of motion upward toward the horizon is a bit more limited than what would be desirable.When mounted 7 feet off the ground you will only be able to capture about 30-40 feet of view. I wish it had another 5-10degrees of motion, but other than that it seems to work more than adequate for a camera at this price point. Time will tell if the camera survives the outdoor environment. If the camera continues to work well, then this review will be left alone. If it fails are anything odd happens I will come back and update it with what happened. I have been very happy with my other cameras so I expect this one will perform the same.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W
Reviews.Author: Evangelio Gonzalez "papa"
Reviews.Content: This is my second cam, same make and model. I am very happy with these products. Marshall set it up and did a great job. The cameras work great on my computer screen, Android and tablet. I will plan to buy more cameras.

Reviews.Title: Dont order this Camera
Reviews.Author: JOHN SNELL
Reviews.Content: I have purchased other Foscam products before, but this specific camera is horrible. It may be decent if you aren't using the wireless feature. This Camera has a known fault with dropping off of a wireless network and able to reconnect. I read several articles on the internet regarding people having the same problem. Working in the wireless industry, the issue looks like a chipset problem to me. Anyway, this is a very unreliable camera, I highly recommend you shop another brand if you are looking for a wireless outdoor camera.Foscam Support : Its also important to note that Foscam support out of India is simply horrible. I called 5 times, and was either blown off, or the clal just disconnected. Foscam is obviously outsourcing to a local India support company, probably Wipro. Anyway, there support is just terrible. I will never buy anotehr Foscam product again after experiencing these problems.Let me repeat, I will never buy another Foscam product ever again.

Reviews.Title: Solid Device
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: After purchasing 4 other Foscam indoor cameras and never having a problem with them, I decided to stay with what works for me.  After reading other reviews I was a little concerned that it was going to be real big, but when it arrived I was surprised how small it was, not even close to "big".  The entire housing is made of metal and very solid, it feels like it’s going to last.Two installation notes:  1. You have to drill a 1 ¼ hole in your building to make the Ethernet connector fit through the wall, it would be nice if it had a small wire to feed through the wall, and then a connector on the end.  2. Mount it as high as you can.  Since I wanted to get a panoramic view of my yard I mounted it on the very top of my garage ~ 25 feet up.  The camera does a good job of looking down and around but not up.Since I have 4 other cameras the settings were easy and it was working in 15 minutes, running the power feed, Ethernet cable and mounting it 25’ up was a different story.  The picture is real clear, and the IR at night is very usable.Like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Alan Ceprano "Alan Ceprano"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about a year,and one day it just stopped working and I paid good money for this and nothing will work.Than I got a hold of foscam support and they told me it was probably the plug,so I check the plug and it was rusted from the weather outside  and I did not protect the plug from the elements.Bought the new plug and everything works just fine and I put plastic and taped the plug .

Reviews.Title: Don't expect to run more than one of these over wireless because they stream in raw uncompressed MPEG
Reviews.Author: Cyberfreak
Reviews.Content: Overall the camera works great, but don't expect to run too many of these over your wireless network. The problem is there is no way to control how much data the camera sends over your wireless network (unless you want to spend the time setting up QoS on your router) so the cameras will flood your wifi network until there is no bandwidth left for anything else.They cannot use the 5GhZ band, so that means you are stuck using the already crowded 2.4GhZ band which (unless you are using two channels) tops out at 54Mb/s. I live in a suburban area that has free public WiFi so that leaves only 40Mhz (two full non-overlapping channels) for everyone else, which isn't too crowded. If you live in a densely populated area you will be lucky if you can get one of these cameras to run over wireless.The camera's video stream is raw MPEG with no compression, which is why they are such bandwidth hogs. I have three of them and I started out running them wirelessly but because they flooded my 2.4GhZ network to the point where it was unusable by any other device and they fight each other for bandwidth, I ended up running cables to hard wire them. Another thing to keep in mind is that because the network is flooded, sometimes the cameras seem to give up and Blue Iris will loose video. If you read the other reviews on here where people are complaining they have to constantly reset the cameras, most likely their wifi is flooded and the camera cannot maintain the stream. Rebooting the camera will fix it for a brief period. Reducing the resolution or frame rate of the cameras does not seem to decrease their network usage.Overall, I like the cameras but keep in mind that if you have more than one you should probably consider running the CAT 5 cable or your wireless network will likely be unusable.

Reviews.Title: Ehhhhhhhh
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Not too impressed with this guy here. I'll give it okay at best because I found utility in the Pan/TIlt feature to remotely watch almost my entire street from work while away. Nightvision started to flicker on me within the first month. Returned it for a 3PM IP camera. Amazon rocks with returns!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, helpful tech support. Remote access, motion dectection, and night vision awesome features
Reviews.Author: Cara Hromada
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this camera to go with the other camera I have already installed at our vacation home that we rent out.night vision - great feature, pretty clear!picture quality - for a security camera it is greatremote access - easy, once it was set up by tech support. It was a little over my head to set up by myselfmail settings - tech support set this up for me, then I scheduled it to only send me emails during the night. Great feature.technical support - 24 hours, very helpful

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dddeans"
Reviews.Content: Works great!  Put on roam and it scans the back yard and even at night gives clear pictures with very little halo effect.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8919W Outdoor Pan and Tilt Wireless IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Cirtian
Reviews.Content: good camera very easy to work with and the tech support helps a lot,. my only one problem the sky view needs to be extended more.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18906W
Reviews.Author: E Christie
Reviews.Content: Have bought this camera to view remotely from the UK to monitor our home in the US.  Couldn't figure out how to set up wirelessly and called Foscam support who were fantastic.  Had the camera up and running in no time at all.  Just thought the instruction booklet could have been a bit clearer.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Fl8910w
Reviews.Author: Tami
Reviews.Content: These are tricky little suckers to set up but after a quick call into phone support and the friendly advisors remote access to my PC, I am all set!! I can see my home from both cameras! Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: I wish it worked
Reviews.Author: someoneSomewhere
Reviews.Content: had this camera for a couple of weeks now. I like the built-in leds for night vision and its range of view (almost 360), but it just constantly hangs and needs hard resets. This renders it pretty useless for me cause I've installed it in a remove location. I've got several Panasonic webcams and will stick with that brand for a few years longer I guess.

Reviews.Title: Are you kidding me?
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: After awaiting a long time to receive 4 cameras I was over whelmed how complicated the wireless setup was. I called tech support and after a long hold they login into my pc and I spent the next 9 hours trying to get them to work. once i did get them to work (in the same room on table as wifi router) I tested in them in their potential final location and none of them worked. All within 30 feet of a high output extender/router in which cell phone and laptop connect with at least three bars. They was never able to get them to work on my cell phone or from remote PC (off of ocal network). It has no audio or zooming, the picture quality is acceptable but PT function is really slow even cranked down to setting 0. The 120v power supply and wiring hanging off the back of the unit is not designed to accept any standard weather proof gang boxes nor is really thought out for outside use. The night vision is very poor. Tech support was extremely difficult to understand since all of them are from India. Don’t buy these, you will have wasted much time and money and be very sorry you did!

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: lenny
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a while it always works great. recently my cable company changed my router and i could not get the camera to work remotely. even though i had this camera for a few years, i called foscam support and Amy Lopez spent an hour setting my camera up remotely for me at no charge, i can not thank her enough for her help.

Reviews.Title: F18919w
Reviews.Author: Matthew D Montez
Reviews.Content: One of the reasons I bought this camera was they had customer support.  Irish did an outstanding job helping me get my second camera setup.  The camera has good clarity.  I am using this camera for home security.

Reviews.Title: Installation of Foscam system
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Thomas was very efficient and helped get our system up and running.  He was very professional and very courteous.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Wish it pointed higher.
Reviews.Author: Curtis Taylor Numberg "Retired in Florida"
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Easy setup with no problems (mine is wired). I would give it 5 stars if the sky view were higher. More plixiglass?

Reviews.Title: Foscam products
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: I called help desk on why my camera was always shutting off. Marshall was very helpful and took care of the problem. I was very impressed. I love the camera.

Reviews.Title: Thomas did a great job!
Reviews.Author: Daniel W. Siegfried
Reviews.Content: Had trouble setting up remote viewing - Thomas walked me through it step by step!  Great job.  I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: WOW! Setup was a breeze
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn
Reviews.Content: This is my second foscam. I set up my first by myself and it took a few hours....I went to set up my second and for some reason my camera wouldn't connect to the set up so I called in to just see what might be going on. Marshall installed my camera for me in about 3 minutes! I was not expecting that. I thought I would just get a few questions answered. FANTASTIC customer service!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Thomas was good and liked it!
Reviews.Author: BESTTHREADS
Reviews.Content: This was a good experience and I like the whole thing very much it was awesome! Yeah it was good.

Reviews.Title: Setting Up Remote Access to FOSCAM
Reviews.Author: Teresa Dobbins
Reviews.Content: I was unable, after many attempts, to set up remote access for my FOSCAMs.  The service agent, Thomas George, efficiently set up both cameras and provided me with clear note directions on accessing the cameras and the applicable applications for my android phone & IPAD.  Thomas was efficient and knowledgeable at solving my problem as well as friendly and informative to me.  His service was excellent and a well deserved "Great Job" and "Thank You".Thomas - Thank You !

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Kendra Denker "Up North"
Reviews.Content: Thomas provided great service setting up my camera.  Love my cameras use them all the time.  Will purchase more from foscam

Reviews.Title: Won't Stay Connected
Reviews.Author: Carson & Judy Liebenow
Reviews.Content: As a truck driver I wanted a way to watch my home.  Shortly after leaving  I went to look at camera's and both indoor and both outdoor weren't connected.  I spent a couple of day's setting these up and to no avail I leave I can't see them.  Word is it is a software problem with foscam.  I will call them when I get home so I can return them or they fix them.  I consider these a waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: Great Support
Reviews.Author: Dipesh Chauhan
Reviews.Content: I like the remote viewing on this camera.its affordable and great addition to any security.they have great Support and Service.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera
Reviews.Author: B.Soli
Reviews.Content: Great video quality. Great price and I can connect from anywhere with internet or my phone. Perfect for home security and watching my dogs. Love it.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: Kevin Bayley
Reviews.Content: great camera and even better customer service I will buying more cameras in the future I recommend this camera to anyone !

Reviews.Title: Foscam ip Camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. Alex Hovsepian
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.Great picture and great panningand make sure to use Foscam support they are great!This camera is great for home and office use

Reviews.Title: Foscam Clarity
Reviews.Author: VALERIE GAYDOS
Reviews.Content: This camera has a wide view and clear picture. Night vision is also better than other cameras I have. While other cameras are easier to set up as plug and play, the support from Foscam was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: F18919 outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Mark R Thomas
Reviews.Content: Great customer support for someone who is not computer savvy like me. The camera has a good wireless feature. This camera i use in my home for home security.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Rough
Reviews.Content: I love it... This camera has features that most other cameras don't have like: 2-way audio, night vision, remote control panning, etc.  I'm very happy with my purchase and with the customer service/technical support.

Reviews.Title: ip camera
Reviews.Author: eddie feliciano
Reviews.Content: install color easy to install  wireless, 300 view left right panning, excellent support service, super well apps for apple and windows,

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM Camera
Reviews.Author: Doug Dechenne
Reviews.Content: Received my camera and PoE splitter today....  I am not technically skilled...  but the Customer Service I got from Calvin H. was excellent!  In no time, he had my camera on and operational.  He was courteous and offered if I had any other problems to call him back...  For the one hour it's been functioning...  the Pan, Tilt function is perfect...  I like that it not only has up/down arrows but can be moved in angles too (if that makes sense to you)  Check Foscam out...  Next one will be HD Quality though.. the colors on this one is weak but great for monitoring the porch/front door.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Support
Reviews.Author: MarkDS "MarkDS"
Reviews.Content: calvin harris @ foscam.us gave professional and suburb CS this afternoon trying to fix two small issues with the FI8919W that I installed.  The initial setup went flawlessly but I had a small problem with remote access because of an ancient router which he fixed quickly.  This camera is great, providing just what I need for some remote monitoring in both daylight and darkness, with movement triggers provided with the additional Blue Iris software.  The Foscam products are great and their CS phone support is above and beyond as calvin harris @ foscam.us proved.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: david m. sotelo
Reviews.Content: camera is great and tech support is great. love the control of the camera. the feature that is nice is the ability to review the days recordings.

Reviews.Title: very good quality.
Reviews.Author: Valerie D.
Reviews.Content: foscam cameras; The tech was very effective and patient. He got the job done.  the video was very high quality

Reviews.Title: Like it so far, hard to set up
Reviews.Author: D3
Reviews.Content: Customer service was helpful, but about 55 minutes on hold to speak with tech support.  Setting this thing up took hours. So far - set up to be able to view from internet and phone. Image quality is good. Night vision option is very neat.

Reviews.Title: Camera support is great!!!
Reviews.Author: vittorio homberger
Reviews.Content: The camera looks great. The customer support at Foscam is very helpful.I have three cameras and they all work great. I can view them from my iphone at work.

Reviews.Title: foascam
Reviews.Author: Kevin Nguyen
Reviews.Content: good quality and can view on phone.  good customer service. I recommender to all my friends and relative to use foscam

Reviews.Title: tech support was great
Reviews.Author: sami hereich
Reviews.Content: The great product, good quality  the price for the camera is great . The tech support was excellent. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: hernan de los reyes
Reviews.Content: the wireless connection is great, and also i really like how the camera works. it does helps alot.I recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Great product and support
Reviews.Author: NobleM400
Reviews.Content: John and I spent the better part of my Sunday evening working on my wireless camera setup...nice that they have 24hr support.  Everything worked out great.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18919W
Reviews.Author: captainwinn
Reviews.Content: Mounting this camera today 1/17/2014- Called tech support and they configured it and set it up for me. It seemed much easier to configure than the Agaiso A622W. I had to return the Agaiso  as I was having a lot of trouble with it. Internet explorer didn't like it.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM IP REMOTE CAM
Reviews.Author: BOB REYNOLDS
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! WORKS GREAT. GREAT TECH SUPPORT ALSO! GOOD QUALITY , GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY. WOULD DEFINITLT RECCOMEND.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: N. Ninotshka Castro
Reviews.Content: just bought this camera, so far so good!the technical support is awesome, thank you Calvin!looking forward to spying on my baby.

Reviews.Title: very easy to install, accurate image
Reviews.Author: westie "bellapalazzo"
Reviews.Content: this camera is a breeze to set up and start using, Customer service is excellent if you have questions. a great bargain.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Raytsen
Reviews.Content: very helpful with wireless camera, Support very professional. Quality is good both on computer and cellphone. Recommend for buying and using.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: Louis R Gauthier
Reviews.Content: We like the fact that they are wireless! The technical support is very supportive and patient with us.  Has been a good experience.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: german ramirez
Reviews.Content: I like the camera very much because it gives me to meny options to revew the activities going on into my apartmet.

Reviews.Title: great tech support.
Reviews.Author: Terrence L. McMullen
Reviews.Content: good pictures remotely.  technical support was very helpful in resolving problems if they arise.  highly recommend.  Talk to calvin in support.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera Audio assistance
Reviews.Author: Laurie Robinson
Reviews.Content: The camera is working wonderfully.  Very clear picture and night vision via the infrared lighting.  Very happy with the purchase.  Had some problems setting up the audio but the tech support was great, fast, and easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Joe Bullen
Reviews.Content: I love that I have complete control of all the operating functions; that my cameras are not just a stationary b/w camera with no audio. my family feels more secure with having this system in our home.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Set up
Reviews.Author: Patrick Cushing
Reviews.Content: This is the second camera I have Purchased.  It is awesome.  The Customer support is unbelievable.  Super fast and Super courteous.  Love that I can View the Camera form my mobile Phone.  Really puts my wife and i at ease when we leave our Newborn at home.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Great tech support if you can't figure something out. Camera works great in all weather. MOst highly recommended for outside use.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: rs
Reviews.Content: excellent support servicegreat picture qualityreliableyou can see and access imaging over the internet any where in the world

Reviews.Title: Technical help
Reviews.Author: K. V.
Reviews.Content: Technical help was great.  He did all the installation.  Now I can use this and I will let you know how it works.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Bill Wesch
Reviews.Content: I have had no issues with the cameras I purchased.  They do exactly what I wanted them to do.  I also appreciate the customer support that I have received.The cameras were easy to set up...the resolution of the cameras is good.  The night vision works really well.

Reviews.Title: Foscam - Great Value
Reviews.Author: Bob Brenna
Reviews.Content: Camera works perfect. A Great value. Would highly recommend. Excellent tech support. Worked right out of the box first time !!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: E. S.
Reviews.Content: Excellent customer service and high quality cameras.  Very easy to use and great picture quality vs others.  Would recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: lawrence
Reviews.Content: Night vision,,camera has a very clear picture in low light conditionsRemote accessEasy to set up, easy to follow instructionsandroid phone,simple format to follow and enjoy mobile viewing on gal3 phonepicture quality,excellent picture quality.

Reviews.Title: foscam cameras
Reviews.Author: kazaz60
Reviews.Content: I had already bought two Foscam cameras- They worked so well that I went out and bought two more and Amy Lopez helped me both times. I am a computer dummy and without her I would be lost. All cameras are up and running great- I can only say Thanks Amy!

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Cynthia J Nabors
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and the technical support was great to get everything installed.  I love the audio feature and recording as well. I love that I can view the cameras from my phone as well.

Reviews.Title: Foscam outdoor ip cam
Reviews.Author: JABOUCHARD
Reviews.Content: Camera works great set up was easy with the help of tech support. Good image and works well. Will look to buy an inside camera next.

Reviews.Title: AAA++++ Foscam Support is the Bomb !!
Reviews.Author: C. Sherer "adaddo"
Reviews.Content: AAA+++  Tech Support (Paul Jackson)  Had me up n running ....even from my phone...in a matter of minutes.Tech Support really is 2nd to none !!Thx again Paul

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech help with install
Reviews.Author: piper dakota
Reviews.Content: I got assistance from Foscam  tech Paul Jackson who did a great job setting up my new Foscam outdoor camera.This camera works great and I assure you no one would go through the lengths that Foscam does to obtain customer satisfaction to a 10 plus. Paul Jackson is dedicated to full customer satisfaction and helped and answered every question I asked . These camera's are awesome and very clear. You will not be disappointed with this product.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM Wireless IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Steven W McCarthy
Reviews.Content: Camera is really great.  The remote access is available from anywhere from a smartphone or computer.  Gives you peace of mind when you're not home.  Thomas from Foscam was a tremendous help with any questions i had about setup. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: My FOSCAM FI8910W units and Customer Service's employee "Ryan"
Reviews.Author: carol thomas
Reviews.Content: re:  my FOSCAM FI8910W units and Customer Service's employee "Ryan"I love using this product.  It eases my mind.  This security system is quite valuable and I have recommended it to my loved ones.Today I received very valuable info and assistance from Mr. RYAN.  His thoroughness and professionalism was greatly appreciated.Thank you.Carol

Reviews.Title: I called for help with Port Forwarding and remote access
Reviews.Author: Paul Cowell
Reviews.Content: I called and talked to John, he was very patient and helpfull with my problems. he asked to access my computer which i approved and he explained in detail what he was doing to help me log-in from outside my home network wifi. He set up a port # for me and attached it to the IP address for the camera. After he had shown me what he had done, he asked if there was anything else he could help with.Very pleasant experience calling. thank you

Reviews.Title: Calvin helped me a lot with my foscam camera support
Reviews.Author: Consuelo Schoen
Reviews.Content: Available 24 hours a day- wonderful service! Calvin went through everything step by step and the camera works well. Occassionaly needs to be rebooted though.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Christian Kelly
Reviews.Content: Foscam was an excellent camera and is great to use. Called in a couple times to the customer service and they were on point and helped me kindly with my issues.. Thanks a lot to Calvin

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: james cronin
Reviews.Content: Quickly done and very patient with my lack of knowledge. CHRIS was very knowledgeable and helped me through with all my problems . Photo is clear and I look forward to using this wonderful system. this will make me feel much safer while I am away from home yet still be able to see what is happening.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Foscam great
Reviews.Author: dominic kerry
Reviews.Content: Infra red is brilliant for security , and keeping a eye on your house from anywhere. Foscam support are also very helpful

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Great camera with great tech support. Spoke with Ryan, he was very professional and provided great customer support and was able to help me to get everything up and running. Highly recommended product.

Reviews.Title: Execellent Customer Service!!!
Reviews.Author: Delise Temple
Reviews.Content: Albert Pearson was my tech today. I am so happy right now. He was very patience as I followed his instructions to get my cams working.I did not believe that there was an ability for Foscam to actually get my cameras online using a remote application. I, personally had to do maybe 4 steps, Albert did the rest of the configurations (thank goodness) and my cams were up and working perfectly.Thank you Albert and thank you Foscam for this great customer care feature.Dr. D. Temple

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM Model: FI8918W
Reviews.Author: Krista Morace
Reviews.Content: I had issues at first with the connection to wireless. The initial setup was easy but connecting to wireless was difficult to do especially remotely. I called the support line and spoke with John. John was very helpful not only did he fix the issue remotely but also assisted me with what to place in my app on my iPhone to remotely view my house. This was such a wonderful experience with customer service. Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: Foscam IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Indra Lind
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, remote connection, excellent quality and wonderful tech support! Highly recommend over other camera brands. Excellent item for the price.

Reviews.Title: First Camera
Reviews.Author: tony lemek
Reviews.Content: Clear view, easy to use, have only used it for one day, but it seems to be very good thanks

Reviews.Title: F18919W
Reviews.Author: Hard Working Steve "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Great support for FI8919W.  Works Great!!!!Technical support helped to get it up and running.I would recommend this camera to anyone lookingfor a good outdoor camera.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for me.
Reviews.Author: BLAKE
Reviews.Content: I own about 20 pt/ptz ip cameras and hands down the foscams are the best. The 10x zoom ptz is the best around. This was very good as well for a much lesser price and of course no zoom but I'll trade no zoom for the headache I got with other brands with 3x zoom which costed similarly. I'm going to purchase 4 more now, that's why I wound up here. Big question when do you ever see an ip cam rated above 4 stars :)

Reviews.Title: Thomas had me up and running in no time very professional,
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Reyes
Reviews.Content: Thomas had me up and running in no time, strongly recommend this camera .very clear and was an ease to setup to my phone.

Reviews.Title: Online remote support for my Fosscam Model Fi8918W
Reviews.Author: Joseph J. Lapiana
Reviews.Content: I needed support from Foscam to reset up my camera, Marshall assisted me with remote control and telephone support and in a short time reset my camera.  This was completed in a very efficient and professional manner.  I highly recommend Foscam and the great support provided when needed

Reviews.Title: Liked very well. solved problems
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: easy to work with.helped me in setup on desktop and phones.very knowledgeable and cameras are working very well

Reviews.Title: Thomas
Reviews.Author: Bruno Rauch
Reviews.Content: Thomas has been excellent help. He is very knowledgable and it I feel very happy to have had him as an expert to help me with my problems.Thank's Thomas

Reviews.Title: Been trying to return these but the vendor has never replied
Reviews.Author: Ron Ster "Ron"
Reviews.Content: These camera's wireless connection is worthless unless you are within a few feet of a router. I tried this with an an Apple AirPort Extreme and while other devices worked, the camera kept losing its connection. I have been trying to return these to the vendor but they never respond. I think the antenna and transmitter needs some work.

Reviews.Title: Impossible to screw in
Reviews.Author: Morning "morning"
Reviews.Content: Horrible camera, overpriced, expensive, impossible to screw in, dome is in the way, horrible IR reflection, no audio. But then again, I guess I'd take this over a FI8910W that will break once winter comes.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8919W
Reviews.Author: igozingo
Reviews.Content: The Foscam FI8919W is a great camera. I am a dealer for Foscam and I sell a lot of the FI9810W. Fantastic camera for the money. I thought I would try this camera and bought 3 for my company to test. So great... We hooked it up in 5 minutes, setup is like any other Foscam Camera, the IR works great, not sure why people are putting this camera down... We have been "working" one of the cameras all the time to try to make it fail and it still works great. Im buying more and going to promote it more as well.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fixed Outdoor Wireless Ip Camera
640 X 480 Display Resolution
22 Ir Lights For Night Vision Up To 15 M
4Mm Lens For 55¡ Wide Viewing Angle
Ir-Cut Filter For True Color Images
ProductInfo.Name: Foscam FI8919W Outdoor Pan and Tilt Wireless IP Camera (White)
